operations.name: AdditionalEffectFading
operations.description: Decrease opacity of an image or a layer.

operations.name: AdditionalEffectReduceInterlaceFlicker
operations.description: Smooth the artifacts resultant from interlacing

operations.name: AdditionalEffectFilterAddNoise
operations.description: Add random variations of brightness or color information.

operations.name: AdditionalEffectFilterBlur
operations.description: Make details unclear or less distinct.

operations.name: AdditionalEffectWarpStabilize
operations.description: Distort and/or crop video layers in order to remove camera shake

operations.name: AdditionalEffectFilterMedianSmoothing
operations.description: Execute a nonlinear digital filtering technique, often used to remove noise while preserving edges.

operations.name: AdditionalEffectFilterSharpening
operations.description: Enhance edge definition within an image.

operations.name: AdditionalEffectFilterSmoothing
operations.description: Smooth textures while preserving edge detail.

operations.name: AdditionalEffectGradientEffect
operations.description: Apply a filter for scaling intensity.

operations.name: AdditionalEffectSoftEdgeBrushing
operations.description: Use a brush tool with a variable feathered edge.

operations.name: AdditionalEffectAddTransitions
operations.description: Add a series of frame modifications that create a visual blend between two pieces of media

operations.name: AntiForensicCameraFingerprintAberrationCorrection
operations.description: Realign Chromatic Aberration.

operations.name: AntiForensicCameraFingerprintCFAHiding
operations.description: Remove the sensor discrepancies from an individual camera.

operations.name: AntiForensicCameraFingerprintCFAInterpolation
operations.description: Modify the sensor discrepancies from an individual camera.

operations.name: AntiForensicCameraFingerprintCFAResize
operations.description: Modify the sensor discrepancies from an individual camera.

operations.name: AntiForensicCameraFingerprintCFARotation
operations.description: Modify the sensor discrepancies from an individual camera.

operations.name: AntiForensicCameraFingerprintENFAlternation
operations.description: Apply evolutionary Neural Fuzzy filters to blur images.

operations.name: AntiForensicCameraFingerprintPhotoResponseNonUniformity
operations.description: Alter an image's noise pattern to match that of another capture device.

operations.name: AntiForensicCompressionCompressionNormalization
operations.description: Alter compression artifacts to appear uniform.

operations.name: AntiForensicCopyExif
operations.description: Alter image metadata.

operations.name: AntiForensicExifCameraModelPara
operations.description: Alter image metadata to display another camera model as capture device.

operations.name: AntiForensicExifDateTime
operations.description: Alter Image Metadata to display a different capture time.

operations.name: AntiForensicExifManipulationSoftware
operations.description: Alter Image Metadata to display a different or no image editing program.

operations.name: AntiForensicExifQuantizationTable
operations.description: Alter Image Metadata to display a different type or no compression.

operations.name: AntiForensicFilterNoiseRestoration
operations.description: Add random variations of brightness or color information to replicate a different capture device.

operations.name: ArtifactsCGIArtificialLighting
operations.description: Add sources of illumination that were not originally present.

operations.name: ArtifactsCGIArtificialReflection
operations.description: Add sources of reflection that were not originally present.

operations.name: ArtifactsCGIArtificialShadow
operations.description: Add shadows that were not originally present.

operations.name: ArtifactsCGIObjectCGI
operations.description: Create objects that were not originally present in an image.

operations.name: ColorBlendColorBurn
operations.description: Alter the blending mode within an image either globally or selectively.

operations.name: ColorBlendColorInterpolation
operations.description: Fill of transparent areas of a current layer with a smooth mix of the colors from the opaque areas.

operations.name: ColorBlendDissolve
operations.description: Edit or paint each pixel to make it the result color. The result color is a random replacement of the pixels with the base color or the blend color, depending on the opacity at any pixel location.

operations.name: ColorBlendMultiply
operations.description: Using the color information in each channel, calculate a color by multiplying the base color by a blend color. The result color is always a darker color. Multiplying any color with black produces black. Multiplying any color with white leaves the color unchanged. When painting with a color other than black or white, successive strokes with a painting tool produce progressively darker colors.

operations.name: ColorColorBalance
operations.description: Alter the Color Temperature of an image on a Yellow Blue Scale.

operations.name: ColorFill
operations.description: Uniformly alter the color of an image within a given selection.

operations.name: ColorHue
operations.description: Alter the color of a selection or image without adjusting saturation or luminance.

operations.name: ColorMatchColor
operations.description: Use a tool to paint an area with the same color values as a selected donor area.

operations.name: ColorOpacity
operations.description: Change the transparency of a given color overlay.

operations.name: ColorReplaceColor
operations.description: Create a selection based on hue that is then painted over with another color value.

operations.name: ColorSaturation
operations.description: Alter the color intensity of a given hue.

operations.name: ColorVibranceContentBoosting
operations.description: Increase intensity of muted colors.

operations.name: ColorVibranceReduction
operations.description: Reduce intensity of muted colors.

operations.name: CreationFilterGT
operations.description: Create an object not originally in the image

operations.name: FillBackground
operations.description: Apply an adjustment to a selection of non foreground objects.

operations.name: FillCloneRubberStamp
operations.description: Replace an area within a given brush diameter with a mapped selection of imagery from another position.

operations.name: FillContentAwareFill
operations.description: Synthesize nearby content for seamless blending with the surrounding content.

operations.name: FillForeground
operations.description: Apply an adjustment to a selection of specified foreground objects.

operations.name: FillGradient
operations.description: Apply a donor adjustment within a selection with scaling intensities.

operations.name: FillHealingBrush
operations.description: Replace imagery within a given brush diameter with a average from surrounding pixels.

operations.name: FillImageInterpolation
operations.description: Replace large selections with an averaging of surrounding pixel groups.

operations.name: FillInpainting
operations.description: Replace areas of an image with semantically similar pixel values to create a seamless image.

operations.name: FillLocalRetouching
operations.description: Create adjustments within a localized selection.

operations.name: FillPaintBrushTool
operations.description: Use a brush to append pixel values within a given diameter.

operations.name: FillPaintBucket
operations.description: Apply a paintbucket to uniformly fill a given selection.

operations.name: FillPattern
operations.description: Use a specified selection pattern to uniformly fill an area.

operations.name: FillRubberStamp
operations.description: Use mapped donor imagery from a given area to fill an extended work area or canvas.

operations.name: FilterBlurMotion
operations.description: Modify an image or image selection to create the illusion of motion.

operations.name: FilterBlurNoise
operations.description: Modify an image or image selection to create the illusion of Camera Noise.

operations.name: FilterCameraRawFilter
operations.description: Make edits to raw imagery in a raw processor.

operations.name: FilterColorLUT
operations.description: Uses a look up table to color grade layers of footage.

operations.name: FilterKeying
operations.description: Remove a color from a layer of video.

operations.name: IntensityBrightness
operations.description: Shift midtone luminance values on a histogram to higher or lower values.

operations.name: IntensityContrast
operations.description: Shift luminance values on a histogram where higher values become higher and lower values become lower.

operations.name: IntensityCurves
operations.description: Shift luminance values on a histogram with an editable and flexible curve.

operations.name: IntensityDarken
operations.description: Shift lower luminance values on a histogram to a higher or lower values.

operations.name: IntensityDesaturate
operations.description: Reduce the given intensity of colors.

operations.name: IntensityExposure
operations.description: Shift all luminance values on a histogram to higher or lower values.

operations.name: IntensityHardlight
operations.description: Increase the contrast of high values in a luminance histogram.

operations.name: IntensityHighlight
operations.description: Change the high values of a luminance histogram.

operations.name: IntensityLevels
operations.description: Adjust brightness, contrast, and tonal range by specifying the location of complete black, complete white, and midtones in a histogram.

operations.name: IntensityLighten
operations.description: Alter the luminance of an image or selection.

operations.name: IntensityLuminosity
operations.description: Alter the values of a luminance histogram.

operations.name: IntensitySoftlight
operations.description: Decrease the contrast in high value areas of the luminance histogram.

operations.name: MarkupDigitalPenDraw
operations.description: Use the pencil or brush tool to add a pixel overlay to an image or selection.

operations.name: MarkupHandwriting
operations.description: Use the pencil or brush tool to add a pixel overlay to an image or selection.

operations.name: MarkupOverlayObject
operations.description: Add an object to another image or selection. Do not use a donor image.  Consider using ArtifactsCGIObjectCGI.

operations.name: MarkupOverlayText
operations.description: Add text to an image or selection. Do not use a donor image.  Donor images must be inserted using a PasteClone operation.

operations.name: OutputBmp
operations.description: Export the image in the bmp format.

operations.name: OutputJpg
operations.description: Export the image in the jpeg format.

operations.name: OutputPng
operations.description: Export the image in the png format.

operations.name: OutputXVID
operations.description: Export the image in the xvid format.

operations.name: OutputMOV
operations.description: Export the image in the MOV format.

operations.name: OutputMP4
operations.description: Export the image in the MP4 format.

operations.name: OutputAVI
operations.description: Export the image in the AVI format.

operations.name: OutputTif
operations.description: Export the image in the tif format.

operations.name: PasteClone
operations.description: Paste a region selected using a clone tool into the same image.

operations.name: PasteFrames
operations.description: Adding a series of frames from a video clip

operations.name: PasteOverlay
operations.description: Paste a series of green screen frames from a donor video clip, overlaying frames.

operations.name: PasteImageSplice
operations.description: Paste into a series of frames an image spliced from another image.  The other image is a Donor image.  The donor image should first be prepared by using an alpha channel to exclude the unselected regions of the image.

operations.name: PostProcessingSizeUpDownOrgExif
operations.description: Alter the metadata in order that when the image is displayed it changes the presentation orientation.

operations.name: SelectRegionFromImage
operations.description: Create a limited selection in a donor image.  The result should be preserved in PNG.  Best practice involves using an alpha channel to mask out unselected regions.  The image can then be spliced into a series if frames.

operations.name: SelectRegionFromFrames
operations.description: Create a limited selection,removing background,from a donor video.  The result should be a black back ground.

operations.name: SelectRemoveFromFrames
operations.description: Remove a region from a series of frames.

operations.name: SelectCutFrames
operations.description: Removing a series of frames from a video clip

operations.name: TimeAlterationEcho
operations.description: Duplicate video frames and replay them at a delay to create a trail.

operations.name: TimeAlterationPosterizeTime
operations.description: Lock a layer to a specific frame rate.

operations.name: TimeAlterationDifferenceEffect
operations.description: Calculate the color difference between two layers as a useful aid in color correction

operations.name: TimeAlterationDisplacementEffect
operations.description: Distorts the image by shifting pixels across time.

operations.name: TimeAlterationWarp
operations.description: Alter frame rate and frame blending to change playback rate. Vector Detail is a integer that determines how many motion vectors are used during interpolation. Methods include 'Whole Frames', 'Frame Mix' and 'Pixel Motion'. Adjust Time By controls is a percentage of reduction.

operations.name: TransformAffine
operations.description: Apply a linear mapping method that preserves points, straight lines, and planes

operations.name: TransformContentAwareScale
operations.description: Resize an image without changing important visual content.

operations.name: TransformCrop
operations.description: Removing edge content from an image.

operations.name: TransformDistort
operations.description: Alter the shape and dimensions of a given selection or image.

operations.name: TransformFlip
operations.description: Reverse pixel coordinates of an image or selection along a vertical or horizontal axis.

operations.name: TransformMove
operations.description: Reposition a selection within a larger composition.

operations.name: TransformResample
operations.description: Reduce or increasing the number of pixels in an image.

operations.name: TransformResize
operations.description: Alter the dimensions of an image. Interpolation values should be one of ‘nearest’, ‘lanczos’, ‘bilinear’, ‘bicubic’ or ‘cubic’.

operations.name: TransformRotate
operations.description: Alter the angle of display for an image or layer.  The image dimensions may resized to accomodate the rotation. The rotation should be provided in degrees counter-clockwise (0 to 360).

operations.name: TransformScale
operations.description: Change the size of an image or layer while preserving dimensions.

operations.name: TransformSeamCarving
operations.description: Resize an image while preserving the integrity of content.

operations.name: TransformShear
operations.description: Warp the shape of an object or a selection with anchored endpoints.

operations.name: TransformSkew
operations.description: Alter the shape or dimensions of a given selection or image along their respective vertices.

operations.name: TransformWarp
operations.description: Freely alter the shape or dimensions of a given selection or image.
